name: Pesto Sauce
keywords: basil, parmesan, pine nuts, gluten-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Remove all tough stems from the basil. Place the basil in the container of a food processor or blender. Add the oil, pine nuts, garlic, salt and pepper. Blend to a fine texture. Add the Parmesan and blend quickly. If you make it in advance, serve at room temperature.
